487a156d-fb54-4bf0-bdcd-8e1ac933ac7d:::||@!@||:::2025-07-21T02:21:22:::||@!@||:::{"id":"487a156d-fb54-4bf0-bdcd-8e1ac933ac7d","title":{"ja-ro":"HP 5 desu kedo Auto Heal ga Areba Shinimasen!"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"HP5ですけど自動治癒（オートヒール）があれば死にません！"},{"en":"My HP's 5, But I Have Auto Heal, So I Won't Die!"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Asoyama Aimi, a first-year high school student, comes up with a grand plan to search for a friend whose contact information she doesn't know by playing the popular VRMMORPG *Real LIFE Online 2* and becoming a popular streamer. She starts playing as the most attractive-looking apprentice saintess, but… it's an extremely unfortunate peaky job class with not a single active player in the world. And then she had an unexpected encounter with Renato, whom she had admired--?!","ja":"家族が処刑され、罪人の子として天涯孤独の身となった伯爵令嬢・ヴィクトリア。\nそんな少女に手を差し伸べ育ててくれたのは兄の親友・レナートだった。\n\n成長したヴィクトリアはレナートの下で秘書として働くように。過去のトラウマから表情を失ってしまったヴィクトリアは“鉄の女”と周囲に蔑まれながらも、\n恩人であり密かに憧れを頂いていたレナートの下で働けることに生きがいを感じていた。\n\nそんなある日、レナートが何者かに狙われ、ヴィクトリアは彼を庇い命を落としてしまう…！\nそして目覚めると、少女の頃に時が巻き戻っていて…!?\n\n「今世こそ、私が家族と愛しい人を救う…！」ヴィクトリアはそう誓うが、2度目の人生はなぜか全てがイージーモードで…!?\nそして、憧れていたレナートとも予想外の出会いを果たし――!?\n\n「鉄の女」と蔑まれた令嬢×美しき英雄公爵の破滅回避ラブファンタジー、ここに開幕！"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0DBJ6D8KK","bw":"series/477046","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/836271","mu":"h7kxu3q","raw":"https://www.cmoa.jp/title/295490"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

6f8dade3-da48-4d71-b03e-3efb1390dfc5:::||@!@||:::2025-07-21T02:21:24:::||@!@||:::{"id":"6f8dade3-da48-4d71-b03e-3efb1390dfc5","title":{"en":"The Epic Of Gilgamesh"},"altTitles":[{"en":"He Who Saw The Deep"},{"en":"Surpassing All Other Kings"},{"ja":"ギルガメシュ叙事詩"},{"ja-ro":"Girugameshu Jojishi"},{"hr":"Ep O Gilgamešu"}],"description":{"en":"When a dying demigod, Gilgamesh of Uruk, returns to his city after hundreds of years of roaming the spirit world only to find his son taking his place, he removes him from the throne to sit in it for the last time and recall the memories and adventures he had with his best friend for life, the one who gave his life purpose - Enkidu. \n\nThe Epic of Gilgamesh is the oldest known written story in the history of humanity. It was written approximately in the 2100s BCE compiled in 12 clay tablets inscribed with cuneiform, the oldest writing system. Following the adventures of a giant demigod king of the oldest city on earth, Uruk, King Gilgamesh follows his equally strong friend Enkidu from a life of power abuse into an adventurous search for immortality battling monsters and gods. Their quest is ultimately fulfilled as they are poetically immortalized by the countless writers, historians, interpreters and of course archaeologists that have worked hard to preserve the story and its meaning of love, friendship and mortality.  \n\nThis is my small attempt at approaching The Epic in contemporary manga/comic form that I originally started as a final project for art school but decided to expand upon it as I didn't feel I gave this beautiful thing justice. Enjoy and thanks if you've read this far!"},"originalLanguage":"en","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"891cf039-b895-47f0-9229-bef4c96eccd4","name":{"en":"Self-Published"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"b13b2a48-c720-44a9-9c77-39c9979373fb","name":{"en":"Doujinshi"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

Then on one fateful day, he chances upon Lucrezia, the marquis daughter known throughout society as the “Phantom Princess.”\n\nHe was charmed by her beauty and grace, utterly swept away by her cordial greeting… only to be rendered utterly shocked by the foul words she harbors within her darkened heart. The words of her soul were so vulgar and uncouth, none would ever believe it came from the lips of such a refined noblewoman.\n\nThus begins the secret tale of two people—one who can hear what must never be spoken, and one who hides a heart darker beyond anyone could ever imagine. It’s a sweet-and-spicy romantic comedy about secrets, miscommunication and love that refuses to stay hidden!","ja":"「彼女を一目見た時、私はとんでもない勘違いをしてしまったのだ――」人の心が読めるスカルバ王国第１王子のレナートは、“幻の姫”と呼ばれる侯爵令嬢のルクレツィアに出会う。ルクレツィアからの挨拶に舞い上がっていたレナートだが、彼が聞いた彼女の心の声は、目の前の美女が言っているとは到底思えない言葉であった…。誰にも言えない秘密がある2人の焦れキュンラブコメストーリーが始まる――。"},"links":{"al":"199374","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/まるかわ-もにこ-ebook/dp/B0FJDGWQW9","bw":"deb8686423-6a49-4af2-93f9-ce3cd2d00d01","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/904218/A006011697/","raw":"https://www.cmoa.jp/title/321024/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

24ea65cd-a08f-45c3-837c-0606b4a19f22:::||@!@||:::2025-07-28T02:22:18:::||@!@||:::{"id":"24ea65cd-a08f-45c3-837c-0606b4a19f22","title":{"en":"Furari"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"ふらり。"},{"ru":"Без цели"}],"lastChapter":"15","availableTranslatedLanguages":["ru"],"description":{"en":"Slowly but surely he takes a promenade through Edo. \"Furari\" could be translated as 'aimlessly', 'at random', 'bend with the wind' or 'go with the flow'. But our stroller this time leaves nothing to chance. Jiro Taniguchi returns with this delightful and insightful tale of life in a Japan long forgotten. Inspired by an historical figure, Tadataka Ino (1745 – 1818), Taniguchi invites us to join this unnamed but appealing and picturesque figure as he strolls through the various districts of Edo, the ancient Tokyo, with its thousand little pleasures. Now retired from business he surveys, measures, draws and takes notes whilst giving free rein to his taste for simple poetry and his inexhaustible capacity for wonder.","ru":"Медленно, но верно он совершает прогулку по Эдо. \"Фурари\" можно перевести как \"бесцельно\", \"наугад\", \"плыть по ветру\" или \"плыть по течению\". Вдохновленный историей Тадатаки Ино (1745-1818), Танигути приглашает нас присоединиться к этой безымянной, но привлекательной и живописной личности, прогуливающейся по различным районам Эдо, древнего Токио, с его тысячью маленьких удовольствий. Сейчас, отойдя от дел, он изучает, измеряет, рисует и делает заметки, давая волю своему вкусу к простой поэзии и неиссякаемой способности удивляться."},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.com/Furari-Jiro-Taniguchi/dp/190800729X/ref=pd_sbs_d_sccl_2_5/133-1609344-5519363?psc=1","mal":"32295","mu":"8zzsxxb"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

07e37a3b-e2f6-41fd-b1b9-d104c4224e5c:::||@!@||:::2025-07-28T02:22:18:::||@!@||:::{"id":"07e37a3b-e2f6-41fd-b1b9-d104c4224e5c","title":{"en":"The Strongest Hero with Negative Destructive Power"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"破壊力マイナスの最強英雄"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["tr"],"description":{"en":"Decades have passed since the world became flooded with monsters. The protagonist, who enrolled in an academy to train those with aptitude, consistently ranked last in ability tests. It would have been one thing if his abilities were merely low, but because he also inflicted a debuff (ability reduction) on his surrounding comrades, he was called “unwanted” and a “burden.”\n\nOne day, while exploring, the protagonist is swallowed by a different dimension and goes missing. There, he encounters a creature from another world and is told the true value of his ability. Originally, magical power is something used to attack by projecting one’s own power outwards. However, the protagonist’s characteristic is the complete opposite of this “output”; it is “input” (absorption), and the ability to suck in external power is his true strength… “Reverse Magic Circuit.” The reason he had been debuffing his allies until now was that he had been unknowingly absorbing their power.\n\nHaving learned the true worth of his power, the protagonist now absorbs monster attacks to nullify them and gathers external power to strengthen himself, mastering his abilities and proceeding on the path to becoming the strongest.","ja":"世界中に魔物があふれてから数十年。適正者を養成する学園に入学した主人公は、能力テストで常に最下位を記録していた。能力が低いだけならともかく、周囲の仲間にデバフ（能力低下）を及ぼすため、「不要品」「お荷物」と呼ばれていた。ある日、探索中に主人公は異空間にのみこまれ行方不明となる。そこで主人公は異界の生物と出会い、自身の能力の真の価値を知らされる。本来魔力とは自身の力を外部に打ち出すことによって攻撃するものだが主人公の特性はそういった「アウトプット（排出）」とは真逆の「インプット（吸収）」であり、外部の力を吸い込むことこそが真の力…「魔導路逆位」であった。これまで仲間たちにデバフを及ぼしていたのも、仲間たちの力を知らず知らずのうちに吸収していたからだ。自身の力の真価を知った主人公は、モンスターの攻撃を吸収して無効化、外部の力を集めて自身を強化と自身の力を使いこなし最強への道を進んでいく。"},"links":{"raw":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/908657/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

d6cf150f-7e90-43f3-9555-d1bc9ed78f73:::||@!@||:::2025-08-04T02:27:05:::||@!@||:::{"id":"d6cf150f-7e90-43f3-9555-d1bc9ed78f73","title":{"ko-ro":"Surviving as a Barbarian in a Fantasy World"},"altTitles":[{"ko-ro":"Pantaji Segye Sok Barbarian-euro Saragagi"},{"en":"Surviving as a Barbarian in a Fantasy World"},{"ko":"판타지 세계 속 바바리안으로 살아가기"},{"vi":"Trở Thành Man Di Ở Thế Giới Fantasy"},{"en":"Barbarian’s Adventure in a Fantasy World"}],"description":{"en":"Every night, he prayed to wake in a world of magic and adventure. One day, his wish came true, though not in the way he expected. He awoke in a vast, snowy wilderness as a Barbarian, a powerful race feared for their strength and savagery.\n\nThough the world was everything he’d dreamed of, his new form came with challenges. Determined not to live as a mindless brute, he learned the human tongue, studied their customs, and became a registered mercenary. But despite his efforts to belong, his monstrous appearance and overwhelming strength lead most to see him as a threat.\n\nNow, caught between the world he longed for and the one that rejects him, he must fight to prove he’s more than what others fear and uncover the reason he was brought here in the first place."},"links":{"al":"196874","mal":"184657","mu":"htmmw28","nu":"barbarians-adventure-in-a-fantasy-world","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/content/67190826"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

c189196b-00a8-4718-9fb1-706825a9e3ca:::||@!@||:::2025-08-04T02:27:07:::||@!@||:::{"id":"c189196b-00a8-4718-9fb1-706825a9e3ca","title":{"en":"My Half"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"マイハーフ"}],"description":{"ja":"「男女性」とは異なる「Dom（支配する者）」と「Sub（支配される者）」という「第二性」が存在する世界。氷瀬清理は、上司からも部下からも慕われる一方で、自身の「Dom」という第二性を隠して生きていた。学生時代の苦い思い出と前職場でのトラウマから、精神安定剤を服用しながら生活する日々。ある夜、清理は公園で圓山結矢と出会う。彼も周囲に「Sub」であることを隠して生活しており、お互いの悩みを打ち明けたことで心が通じ合う2人。そんな中、結矢の愛犬・サブローが暴れ出す。結矢はサブローに「Kneel（おすわり）」と指示すると、なぜか清理にもそのコマンドが効いてしまうのだった。"},"links":{"raw":"https://asacomi.jp/episodes/8f23658496793/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"92d6d951-ca5e-429c-ac78-451071cbf064","name":{"en":"Office Workers"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}}]}

Ever since I met her in the fall of my first year of high school, my life has been anything but ordinary. It all changed when another guy with the same name as me showed up at school – a handsome one, no less – and suddenly my classmates started calling me 'Number Two.'\n\n\"You're not 'Number Two' to me,\" she said. \"Besides, it's me who wants to kiss you first.\"\n\nMy relationship with Chinatsu goes beyond just school. We play street basketball after class, cook meals together, share secrets, and even grow physically closer. I thought I was fine being alone, but she accepts me for who I am. And because of that, I want to give her the same in return.\n\nThis is a coming-of-age love story about realizing how precious even the simplest desires can be.\n\n(Source: Kadokawa, translated)","ja":"誰かの“二番目”でいい。キミの“一番”なら。誰とでも気軽に話せて絶大な人気を誇る美少女・南野千夏。\n彼女と知り合った高校一年の秋から、同姓同名のイケメンの陰で同級生から“二番”と呼ばれている僕の生活は変わり始めた。「“二番”なんかじゃないし。……うちが初めてキスしたいって思うんだから」南野とは学校以外でも会うようになった。放課後はストリートバスケに一緒に行って、一緒にご飯を作って、二人だけの秘密を話して、触れあって。独りでいいはずだったのに、彼女は僕を認めて、あいしてくれる。だから僕も、それを返したいって思うんだ。当たり前の願いが当たり前に尊いと気付く、青春恋愛ストーリー。","pt-br":"Minamino Chinatsu é uma garota linda, incrivelmente popular e descontraída. Jogamos basquete de rua depois da aula, cozinhamos juntos, compartilhamos segredos e até nos aproximamos fisicamente. Eu achava que estava tudo bem sozinho, mas ela me aceita como eu sou. During their walks, Rose encounters acquaintances of her father—including a potter and poet, an old lady friend, his housekeeper and chauffeur—whose interactions help her to slowly begin to accept a part of herself that she has never before acknowledged.\n\nAs the reading of the will gets closer, Rose's father finally, posthumously, opens his heart to his daughter, offering her a poignant understanding of his love and a way to accept all she has lost."},"links":{"al":"166574","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/%E9%AB%98%E6%B5%9C%E5%AF%9B-ebook/dp/B0DGXBLDHJ/ref=sr_1_1?crid=25QKAQHSQIHLJ\u0026dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.C4JuCtVJMl-iRsYNpKm-3cH11o4d-iYle0ksAaZ3kI0.0kX-ZfZNcn1W0J69wPOeRqsF0XONMQrh-dKQV9fyMCE\u0026dib_tag=se\u0026keywords=%E8%96%94%E8%96%87%E3%81%8C%E5%92%B2%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A8%E3%81%8D\u0026qid=1753803377\u0026s=digital-text\u0026sprefix=%E8%96%94%E8%96%87%E3%81%8C%E5%92%B2%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A8%E3%81%8D%2Cdigital-text%2C641\u0026sr=1-1","bw":"deb862045e-4b6f-4371-b43d-13f5b6411a7f","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/851641/","mal":"160050","mu":"p2rg0cl"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}
